name: Oricorio Baile Style
description: The Dancing Pokémon. It wins the hearts of its enemies with its passionate dancing and then uses the opening it creates to burn them up with blazing flames.

abilities.name: Dancer
abilities.description: If any creature within sight of this Pokémon activates a move with Dance in its name, this Pokémon may immediately use one of its moves as a reaction.

abilities.name: Form Change (Oricorio)
abilities.description: This Pokémon's form can change by giving it a certain kind of Nectar. Red Nectar changes it to Baile Style, Pink Nectar changes it to Pa'u Style, Purple Nectar changes it to Sensu Style, and Yellow Nectar changes it to Pom-Pom Style.
